PAGERBEAUTY_HTTP_USER.description: Enable basic HTTP authentication: user name

PAGERBEAUTY_HTTP_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Enable authentication access token. Allows embedding PagerBeauty when basic HTTP authentication is enabled by appending ?access_token=your_token to schedule URL

PAGERBEAUTY_PD_API_KEY.description: PagerDuty REST API v2 Access Key, example: y_NbAkKc66ryYTWUXYEu

PAGERBEAUTY_PD_SCHEDULES.description: Comma-separated list of PagerDuty schedule ids, example: PJ1P5JQ,P538IZH
